text:
I freaking love Valentine’s Day. And it’s not because of the cheesy cards or the in-your-face decorations or the high-pressure ~romantic~ dates or the existential crisis that can creep up if you’re single and not a fan of it. No, I love Valentine’s Day because I use it as an excuse to buy myself a really freaking good beauty or makeup gift that I’d normally never spend my money on.



There’s no real reason to buy a V-Day gift for myself—it just feels nice. It’s fun. I’m my own Cupid and Santa Claus and partner for a day, and I easily justify buying a designer candle or fancy blow dryer without feeling (too) guilty. SELF-LOVE, BABY. And because I highly recommend every human try out my way of life, I rounded up the 18 best Valentine’s Day gifts to give yourself this year, below. Check them out, find your favorite, and make yourself very, very happy.
authors: Chloe Metzger Is The Deputy Beauty Director At Cosmopolitan
Obsessively Writing About New Makeup Launches
The Skincare Formulas That Really Work For Every Skin Type
title: 18 Best Valentine's Day Gifts You Should Give Yourself in 2020
